participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Candid and straightforward, with a hint of vulnerability.
participant_1.background: i now live in the city. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Whimsical and imaginative, always dreaming big.
participant_2.background: i like to make time stop. i'm a little girl. i live in the cloud. i have superpowers.
